scenes.background: [Monica] seems unsatisfied with your decision to prioritize your rest.
scenes.description: 'Don't worry about it, Monica. I can handle it. But are you sure you're okay with this?' He looks at you questioningly.

options.text: Yes, I trust you can manage it. I'll be available if something urgent comes up.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and trust in your colleague, but your motivation might seem lower.

options.text: Maybe I should stay on standby to ensure everything goes smoothly.
options.analysis: You show high emotional perception and empathy but may overextend yourself, affecting self-regulation.

options.text: Monica, this isn't about fairness. Bob, you can manage. I'll be resting.
options.analysis: You prioritize your rest, showing strong self-regulation, but empathy and motivation could be perceived as lower.
